Articles.Content:
this is a very very good, very easy to fly fighter jet that can fire missiles

**it has been rated very high by the community**

**i will gets some pics of it up soon**

**within the next 2 days**
May I suggest that rather than posting a post with a link to the old post, that you UPDATE the old post by using the modify button. This cuts down on spam and excess posts.
Nice airplane, but I recommend you do as Dogon has suggested.

Sorry about the spam

i didnt know

i swear
